markdown.headingText: Most of my publications are available as preprints on PsyArXiv. If possible, the corresponding data and materials are available via OSF. If you need an individual copy of a publication or access to additional data and materials, please [send me an email](mailto:maik.bieleke@uni-konstanz.de).
markdown.srcMarkdownNoYaml:
Most of my publications are available as preprints on PsyArXiv. If possible, the corresponding data and materials are available via OSF. If you need an individual copy of a publication or access to additional data and materials, please [send me an email](mailto:maik.bieleke@uni-konstanz.de).
